name: Dancing Runner
description:
A thrilling endless runner game with cute cartoon dancing theme.

Enjoy the amazing cute dance with challenging endless running high score. Try avoiding blocks as many as possible. The game becomes more thrilling as you go further.

Challenge with your friends on who's gonna survive and reach the furthest. Turn, Dodge, Jump over and slide under obstacles  for a non-stop run.

Features:

- Cute 3D Cartoon Graphics

- Cute dancing animation

- Varieties of Obstacles

- Interesting European City theme  

- Nostalgic music track

- Free to Play
